title: Arga
data:
{{version031}} {{flavour|A beautiful mithril axe, probably lost by some dwarven hero.}} [[File:Mithril_axe_arga.png]] '''''the +8 mithril axe "Arga"''''' +8 [[broad axe]] [[Speed brand]]
+40 [[Will]] ==Desirability== '''Arga'''{{source ref|0.31.0|art-data.txt|608}} is a broad axe of speed: a top tier one-handed weapon with a top tier brand. The speed brand makes it safe to use even at low skill, though it really shines at mindelay, where you'll attack at least twice for every action by a normal speed enemy. Needless to say, Arga is an incredibly powerful weapon, easily able to define a run, and viable to swap to during the mid-game. The willpower boost is just a cherry on top. While a weapon with [[holy wrath]] might be stronger in the extended part of the game, Arga is still useful for anything unaffected by it, or if you're [[undead]]/[[demonspawn|demonic]] and unable to wield weapons of holy wrath. ==History== *Prior to [[0.19]], Arga had a +2 Strength bonus. *Prior to [[0.15]], Arga had a +10, +6 enchantment bonus. *Prior to [[0.14]], Arga had a smaller [[magic resistance]] bonus. *Prior to [[0.13]], Arga was a [[war axe]]. ==References== [[Category:Unrands]] [[Category:Axes]]
